entry.title: Love Takes Miles
entry.summary:
Author: Mad_Hatty

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 930Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Bruce Wayne has everything sorted, the perfect balance between the secret crime-fighting life and his persona as the loveable boy billionaire. Is it draining? Sure, but that is hardly something to stop him. He is perfectly capable of balancing everything, or he was. When he meets the driven and kind journalist Clark Kent, everything Bruce has ever known is thrown sideways. The only issue, Clark doesn't seem to care about him. Meanwhile, Superman is dealing with his super-crush on his co-member of the Justice League, Batman. A Miraculous-inspired love square shenanigans.

entry.title: Second time is the charm
entry.summary:
Author: Emelian65

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,979Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 85

Summary: Clark wakes up in his bed, feeling strange. He had vivid dreams of a cataclysmic future. He sits up, tries to shake it off, but the memories are too detailed, overwhelming. He remembers the world ending, heroes falling, his own death? But then he's alive, young. He checks the date... It's now 2011, several years in the past.

entry.title: Shazam! Is a Greek kid?
entry.summary:
Author: Atlas_the_punished_titan

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,320Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 96

Summary: Billy Batson is a kid from ancient Greek that was killed by the gods so he could become a man made of lightning, to fight their battles. He forgot everything from his life as a Greek child, until an accident with a wizard turned him back into the Greek child he was. Will the Justice League finally find out about their teammate's past, or will Captain Marvel find out what the gods that control him did to him.

entry.title: Brighter than my eyes can bear
entry.summary:
Author: white_zane

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,801Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Bruce had never thought that he‚Äôd see a sunray this bright in the dark pit of despair that he called home. And yet, here Superman was, visiting Gotham for the first time. Of course, Batman acted like he didn‚Äôt want the meta here. He could handle his city alone. But in the face of an alien invasion, causing Gotham to be cut off from the rest of the USA entirely, he couldn‚Äôt really refuse his help anymore. Not when he clearly needed it. Batman might be prideful, but he wasn‚Äôt going to let more people get endangered because of that.And at the same time, he couldn‚Äôt help but feel like he was looking at an angel every time he saw Superman from the corner of his eye. He had to take a closer look at those eyes one day, they looked straight up otherworldly. Well, they kind of were, but still- OR: When they first meet, Bruce really hates Superman, but also can't figure out why he feels so strongly about him. Superman, on the other hand, finds the dark knight just really off putting. Off putting enough to keep on being around him as much as possible, for some reason.

entry.title: Arisen The Bat
entry.summary:
Author: dexpair

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,242Chapters: 6/71Kudos: 4

Summary: On the streets of a Neo Gotham, old man Bruce Wayne lived his life as quite as possible. No more hero stuff, no more meetings with The League in space. His days were filled with silly conversations with his husband or listening to the dramas of his teenage son. It was an opposite reality to the one he had lived his whole life, but that's what made it special for him. However, on a special day, Bruce discovers that getting rid of his past life wouldn't be so easy. Ghosts from the past have returned, this time haunting his children, and The Dark Knight realizes he will have to act for his city and his family one last time.

entry.title: Batman CAN'T be Non-Meta... He Isn't Is He?

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,843Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 233

Summary: Batman keeps getting "severe" injuries on missions but shrugs them off. After being insistent on being non-meta the JL start to worry. But after centuries of being a cryptid he may or may not have forgotten how "average" non-meta's react and behave... at first they shrugged it off as Batman being... well Batman.
